alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Houston; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 9:01AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Clayton, northeastern Fayette, Allamakee, eastern Winneshiek, Winona, eastern Fillmore, Houston, western Jackson, Vernon, southwestern Richland, Crawford, western Monroe, Trempealeau, Buffalo, La Crosse and Grant Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 900 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Durand to near Houston to Edgewood. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Caledonia around 905 AM CDT. Hokah around 915 AM CDT. La Crescent, Mondovi and Brownsville around 920 AM CDT. La Crosse, Stoddard, French Island and La Crosse Airport around 925 AM CDT. Cassville around 930 AM CDT. Strum and Coon Valley around 940 AM CDT. Bangor around 945 AM CDT. Osseo around 950 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Franklin, County Roads G And H, Eastman, Stevenstown, Giard, Quandahl, Riceford, Highway 88 And County O, Rockland and County Roads D E And E. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 between mile markers 88 and 109. Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 244 and 276. Interstate 90 in Wisconsin between mile markers 1 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
